But don't you think that the hype usually hides in the details? Seed dance 2.0 nails four things the West is still chasing. And number one, director level control. Upload a clip, reference the camera movement, the pacing, the energy, and seat dance clones that cinematic brilliance onto your new scene. Then of course, at number two, multi-cene storytelling. We have all experienced that the biggest hurdle in an AI video, consistency. Usually the character's face changes every 5 seconds, but that is not an issue anymore on seed dance. It ensures the lighting, the face and the visual language remains consistent across multiple shots. Moving on to number three, which is native audio. That of course is the game changer. Most AI videos are silent. One needs to add the sound later. Seed dance generates video and audio together. dialogue, ambiance, even the footsteps. It's perfectly synced in a single pass. And finally, at number four, the speed. 2K video, which is 30% faster than the last version. Complex scenes in under 60 seconds. And here is, of course, the very exciting part.
